snippet.title: Persona 3 Reload — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Your story begins again. Memento Mori. 🌙
Awaken the depths of your heart in Persona 3 Reload, the genre-defining RPG now reborn for modern consoles.

Coming to Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Windows PC in early 2024!

https://www.xbox.com/games/persona

Subscribe to Xbox: 🎮 https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

Follow Xbox in other channels:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Xbox
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/Xbox
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Xbox
